channel.title: Relentless-Mist || The New Way
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZNeA3.png[/img][/CENTER]
[center] [B]Welcome to Relentless-Mist, I myself Mist (Mac)am the founder of the server, I have just recently opened it. I have based the server off of player killing in the earlier stages of RuneScape, Such as when Bounty Hunter was around. I wanted the server to mere how Bounty Hunter was during that Runescape Era, and I have done so quite professionally with help from some friends. I have finally decided to host it because the combat is near-perfected. Everything is almost flawless and such.[/B][/center]
[center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6WQ5Z.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://relentless-mist.com"]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RUutK.png[/img][URL=http://"http://relentless-mist.com/RelentlessMist.jar"]Download[/URL]
Features:
Prayer fix ( switching prayers has effect delays to match rs , so you can do specials without players praying ) Bounty Hunter Scoreboards ( ACTUALLY WORKING ) Most damage gets drop ( with damage reseting perfect for luring in BH ) Target Cap, no more then 3 people can get 1 person as a target Full private chat without crashing. Full Magicks book ( all spells, not just barrage/maismic spells, but every single ancient spell ) Barrows degrade when dropped on death Perfect Switching [ unreleased and no dupes ] Perfect Potting (single/double dose) Deposit all in bank working Potion Mixing Corperal Beast Sound Effects for eating, attacking, pvp, music, pvm. Summoning Makeover Mage Fully Redone
Small Fixes: No diagonal attacking/ attacking if standing on the same spot as somebody Veng saving ( after 30 seconds you can't cast another veng until your first one Fades and veng saves even if you logout/back in ) Magic immunity ( so you don't get refrozen right after the freeze fades ) Autocast small fix ( can't auto cast if you arent on ancients, not the gay emote it does if somebody forgets to switch to ancients ) When you have enough barrage runes, your spellbook will always have the spells Highlighted, doesn't randomly unhighlight like other z508s. 100% penalties, saves on logout, and shows the penalties on the bounty hunter Interface even if you log in and out. Real max hit calculator ( Tested with all the max hit calculators )
Make Over Mage [Redone]:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wSq9Q.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E2hbt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GlYNC.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N2D94.png[/img]
Server Media:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gSwIU.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A67j4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xCvcl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4xk3S.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Wn3Y0.png[/img]
I will post more server media, the server has been out for a full day now and already has reached 10+ players. It's a growing fun community, I can't wait to see everyone coming and playing.
Thanks, Mist
Updates:
Orbs Fixed: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Na4b4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WHXLx.png[/img]
You cannot walk or talk while in orb.
Networths:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rpR0O.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: Relentless-Mist || The New Way
item.dc:creator: @Mac_Ft Mac Ft
item.description:
@Mac_Ft wrote:

[CENTER]

ZNeA3.png800×120
[/CENTER]

[center]
Welcome to Relentless-Mist, I myself Mist (Mac)am the founder of the server, I have just recently opened it. I have based the server off of player killing in the earlier stages of RuneScape, Such as when Bounty Hunter was around. I wanted the server to mere how Bounty Hunter was during that Runescape Era, and I have done so quite professionally with help from some friends. I have finally decided to host it because the combat is near-perfected. Everything is almost flawless and such.[/center]

[center]
Forums
Download

Features:

Prayer fix ( switching prayers has effect delays to match rs , so you can do specials without players praying )
Bounty Hunter Scoreboards ( ACTUALLY WORKING )
Most damage gets drop ( with damage reseting perfect for luring in BH )
Target Cap, no more then 3 people can get 1 person as a target
Full private chat without crashing.
Full Magicks book ( all spells, not just barrage/maismic spells, but every single ancient spell )
Barrows degrade when dropped on death
Perfect Switching [ unreleased and no dupes ]
Perfect Potting (single/double dose)
Deposit all in bank working
Potion Mixing
Corperal Beast
Sound Effects for eating, attacking, pvp, music, pvm.
Summoning
Makeover Mage Fully Redone

Small Fixes:
No diagonal attacking/ attacking if standing on the same spot as somebody
Veng saving ( after 30 seconds you can’t cast another veng until your first one Fades and veng saves even if you logout/back in )
Magic immunity ( so you don’t get refrozen right after the freeze fades )
Autocast small fix ( can’t auto cast if you arent on ancients, not the gay emote it does if somebody forgets to switch to ancients )
When you have enough barrage runes, your spellbook will always have the spells Highlighted, doesn’t randomly unhighlight like other z508s.
100% penalties, saves on logout, and shows the penalties on the bounty hunter Interface even if you log in and out.
Real max hit calculator ( Tested with all the max hit calculators )

Make Over Mage [Redone]:

Server Media:

I will post more server media, the server has been out for a full day now and already has reached 10+ players. It’s a growing fun community, I can’t wait to see everyone coming and playing.

Thanks,
Mist

Updates:

Orbs Fixed:

Na4b4.png250×505

WHXLx.png762×505

You cannot walk or talk while in orb.

Networths:


[/center]
